definitions.definition: The youngest of the three Fates , a daughter of Zeus and Themis ; the spinner of the thread of life . Her Roman equivalent is Nona .

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) The youngest of the three Fates , a daughter of Zeus and Themis ; the spinner of the thread of life . Her Roman equivalent is Nona .
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) 97 Klotho , a main belt asteroid .
